DOC.HEADLINE: Blue ear disease reoccurs in Vietnam's central province

TEXT.P: Blue ear disease reoccurred in Vietnam's central province of Quang Nam, killing 50 pigs in one commune, local newspaper the Labor reported Thursday.
The pigs were found infected with the blue ear disease after having symptoms of high fever and becoming paralyzed, said the newspaper. All the dead pigs were destroyed.
Meanwhile, another 50 pigs in two other communes of Quang Nam are having the same symptoms, according to the newspaper. They are being quarantined and treated.
